Name: Core Passive: Eternal Seasons
Additional Ability: Three Verses of Farewell at Yang Pass
Descriptions: When Qingyi lands a Finishing Move on an enemy with her <color=#ffffff>Basic Attack: Enchanted Moonlit Blossoms</color>, it applies 5 stacks of <color=#ffffff>Subjugation</color> to the enemy, stacking up to 20 times. Each stack of <color=#ffffff>Subjugation</color> increases the target's Stun DMG Multiplier by <color=#2BAD00>2</color>%. For each rush attack performed during <color=#ffffff>Basic Attack: Enchanted Moonlit Blossoms</color>, the Finishing Move will apply an extra stack of <color=#ffffff>Subjugation</color>. If <color=#ffffff>Perfect Dodge</color> is triggered when using the Finishing Move, it directly applies 10 stacks of <color=#ffffff>Subjugation</color>. When applying Subjugation to normal and elite enemies, the target receives double the stacks. When the target recovers from being Stunned, the corresponding stacks of <color=#ffffff>Subjugation</color> are reset.

When another character in your squad is an <color=#ffffff>Attack</color> character or shares the same Faction:
<color=#ffffff>Basic Attacks</color> deal 20% increased Daze. If Qingyi's Impact is greater than 120, each point over increases her ATK by 6, up to a maximum of 600.

When Qingyi lands a Finishing Move on an enemy with her <color=#ffffff>Basic Attack: Enchanted Moonlit Blossoms</color>, it applies 5 stacks of <color=#ffffff>Subjugation</color> to the enemy, stacking up to 20 times. Each stack of <color=#ffffff>Subjugation</color> increases the target's Stun DMG Multiplier by <color=#2BAD00>2.4</color>%. For each rush attack performed during <color=#ffffff>Basic Attack: Enchanted Moonlit Blossoms</color>, the Finishing Move will apply an extra stack of <color=#ffffff>Subjugation</color>. When the target recovers from being Stunned, the corresponding stacks of <color=#ffffff>Subjugation</color> are reset.

Cons.Name: Insulation Breakdown
Cons.Effect: When Qingyi enters combat, <color=#ffffff>Flash Connect Voltage</color> is instantly restored to its maximum, and the accumulation rate is increased by 30%. When using her <color=#ffffff>Basic Attack: Enchanted Moonlit Blossoms</color>, if <color=#ffffff>Flash Connect Voltage</color> is at its maximum, the attack will reduce the DEF of the enemy it hits by 15%, and Qingyi's CRIT Rate against that enemy will increase by 20% for 15s.

Cons.Name: Minimal Effort, Maximum Impact
Cons.Effect: The Stun DMG Multiplier increase provided by each stack of <color=#ffffff>Subjugation</color> in <color=#ffffff>Core Passive: Eternal Seasons</color> increases to 135% of its original value. When Qingyi's attack hits an enemy and the stacks of <color=#ffffff>Subjugation</color> she applies reaches its maximum stacks, her Daze dealt to the target increases by 15%.

Cons.Name: Stable Arc Barrier
Cons.Effect: Upon entering or exiting <color=#ffffff>Flash Connect</color> state, gain a shield equal to 10% of Qingyi's Max HP. If a previous shield is still active when the shield effect refreshes, Qingyi generates 5 Energy. This Energy Generation effect can be triggered once every 10s.

Cons.Name: Eight Meridians
Cons.Effect: The Interrupt Level of <color=#ffffff>Basic Attack: Enchanted Moonlit Blossoms</color> is greatly increased, and the CRIT DMG is increased by an additional 100%. When Qingyi hits an enemy with her <color=#ffffff>Basic Attack: Enchanted Moonlit Blossoms</color>, the target's Attribute DMG RES is reduced by 20% for 15s.
